Panzer::

She felt him grab her shoulder.  She slapped his hand hard and got 
loose.  She knew he could kill her if she tried to run. So for now, 
she'd have to stay put in order to survive. "Get your slimey claws 
off of me you...you...what ever you are. First off, you don't go 
touching me. Second, I understand I'm stuck here with you and that I 
don't have much choice in the matter, but you can act more polite 
about giving me orders. Third, what are you going to do with me now 
that you have me? I mean, I can't run, you'll just kill me. So what 
are your intentions?" as she put her sidearm away. For now, she'd 
have to go along with things and just wait for  her chance to escape.
"Now then, what are we going to do? Go back to your little hole in 
the sewer and stay there untill you give who ever your demands?"Her 
tone wasn't sarcastic, but more matter of fact.  She wasn't rude in 
her tone or posture. But she was assertive. She showed no fear 
towards them at all. 



--- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> Attilla/Luzbel:::
> 
> Attilla and Luzbel looked each other a nano, after that Luzbel 
> said "We haven't attacked you , other bots have done it... now" 
said 
> the male while he grabbed her "Now listen me you're prisioner of 
war, 
> unless you want end roasted you will come with us!!!"
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., logomorph@h... wrote:
> > Panzer::
> > 
> > She started to wake up. Her vision was returning.  She slowly 
> opened 
> > her optics and notice two very large figures standing over her.  
> She 
> > rubbed her optics with her paws and looked at them again. Her 
> vision 
> > was clear now. She saw the two dragons from earlier.  She tried 
to 
> > jump to her feet, but her hind feet didn't want to co-operate. 
She 
> > transformed into bot mode and stood there, on shakey legs. "Who 
are 
> > you? Why did you attack me? I didn't attack you? You know, that 
> > wasn't very nice."  She drew her sidearm, but kept it at her 
side. 
> If 
> > they hadn't killed her by now, then they must have a reason for 
> > keeping her alive. "Would you please explain to me what is going 
> on?"
